Package org.soen6441.controller

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
org.soen6441.controller.GameEngine
public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
This is the main controller class of MVC model. This class has a references of View, Models and various child controllers. This class acts as an intermediary between models/controllers and view.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  GameEngine.CommandListener
    This is a child class of the GameEngine which listens to the actions performed by button in view.

      public Phase getPhase()
      This method returns the current phase
      Returns:
      object of current phase

    • assignCountries

      public void assignCountries() throws java.lang.Exception
      This Method will take assign countries from command prompt and will do startup Phase as well as assigning reinforcements to the player
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - this is user defined exception based on AssignCountries if there are no players assigned then it will throw an exception

    • showAllPlayerWithArmies

      public void showAllPlayerWithArmies()
      This is a method to show all player details like PlayerNames,armies,Countries owned

    • showMap

      public void showMap​(Phase p_GamePhase)
      This is a method to show all countries and continents, armies on each country, ownership, and connectivity
      • Map Phase : For Each Continent in Continent List, For each country in that continent, For each neighbor in that country
      • Game Phase : Apart from continent, country and neighbors, it also shows player, thier ownership and their number of armies.
      Parameters:
      p_GamePhase - takes the phase object and shows the map accordingly

    • loadGame

      public void loadGame​(java.lang.String p_Command)
      This method calls the loadGame method of the GameModel to load previously saved game. After loading all the objects to their respective places, it changes the state of the game accordingly.
      Parameters:
      p_Command - command entered by the user.

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame​(java.lang.String p_Command)
      This method calls the savegame method of GameModel to save the game during gameplay. Once the game is saved, this method also sets it phase to GameSaved phase.
      Parameters:
      p_Command - command entered by the user

    • tournament

      public void tournament​(java.lang.String p_InputString) throws java.lang.Exception
      This method implements tournament mode.
      • It takes the input string from the user and initializes variables.
      • Based on number of maps and number of games we will iterate the main tournament loop.
      • Based on number of player strategies we will create the players with respective strategies.
      • Now we will call the tournament startup phase to assign the countries to the players.
      • Iterate all the players starting with assign reinforcements, player issue order and player next order.
      • Now we will terminate the above loop in two cases : (i) if we have a winner (ii) If the number of turns are exceeded.
      • So once a game is completed we will clear the game model object and map object.
      • As the game is completed, we store the result in the hashmap.
      Parameters:
      p_InputString - tournament command with list of maps, player strategies, number of games, number of turns
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - for addPlayer

    • printTournamentResult

      private void printTournamentResult​(int p_M, int p_G, int p_D, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> p_tournamentResult, java.lang.String[] p_PlayerStrategyList)
      This method prints the tournament result for each individual map and each individual game.
      Parameters:
      p_M - Number of maps
      p_G - Number of games
      p_D - Number of turns
      p_tournamentResult - Result of the tournament
      p_PlayerStrategyList - Player strategy list

    • getFormattedString

      private java.lang.String getFormattedString​(java.lang.String p_Input)
      This is a generic method to receive String in a specific format.
      Parameters:
      p_Input - input string which need to be modified in specific format
      Returns:
      modified string
